TABLE.NAME: report_ee
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores data for externalexaminer reviews of modules

FIELD.NAME: course
FIELD.COMMENT: The user ID of the externalexaminer

FIELD.NAME: comments
FIELD.COMMENT: externalexaminer comments if the assignments don't mexternalexaminert standards

FIELD.NAME: locked
FIELD.COMMENT: The timestamp of the lock form event. If null, the form is not locked

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: The timestamp of the last modification event

TABLE.NAME: report_ee_assign
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores data for externalexaminer reviews of modules

FIELD.NAME: user
FIELD.COMMENT: The user ID of the externalexaminer

FIELD.NAME: sample
FIELD.COMMENT: The status of the selection for Criterion A

FIELD.NAME: level
FIELD.COMMENT: The status of the selection for Criterion B

FIELD.NAME: national
FIELD.COMMENT: The status of the selection for Criterion C
